transcript: on the sofa, leaned back his big head with its broad temples and close-cropped hair, and looked at Beziikhov. The stern, shrewd, and penetrating expression of that look struck Pierre. He felt a wish to speak to the stranger, but by the time he had made up his mind to ask him a question about the roads, the traveler had closed his eyes.
